name: localai
tagline: A self-hosted engine for running large language models locally
description: LocalAI is a self-hosted artificial intelligence inference engine that runs LLMs locally with no external API calls. It supports model selection, GPU acceleration, and provides an API compatible with OpenAI.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Run AI models locally, No external API calls, GPU acceleration. Private AI on your hardware

features.title: Openai Compatible
features.description: Drop-in replacement API, Compatible clients, Easy migration. Use existing tools with local models

features.title: Model Support
features.description: Multiple LLM formats, Custom models, Model management. Flexible AI model deployment

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete privacy, No data sharing, Offline capable. Own your AI infrastructure
